sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: StreamFlow (http://streamsource.se/streamflow) is a system for managing the work flow of individuals or organizations. It follows the Getting Things Done (GTD) thinking in that it should be easy to create new projects or tasks, etc. It provides statistics that can be used by third-party reporting tools. As a bonus, it also integrates easily with external systems.

sect1.title: Packaging overview
sect1.para: The system consists of the following pieces:

listitem.para: streamflow-war (StreamFlow server web application, front-end for the REST-API and the client download page)
streamflow-help (on-line help, used by the client)

sect1.title: Support
sect1.para: StreamFlow 0.2 is supported on any platforms running Java WebStart on Java 5.0 and later.
The support forum is located at http://forum.streamsource.se/streamflow, and the project web page is http://streamsource.se/streamflow.
